column5: Canada wins Gold in the Men's Skeleton!!!! What a race!!!! WOOHOO!!!!!!!!!!
You know that guy is going to get absolutely wrecked tonight!!!!!!!
Oh yeah!!!! He was walking up to do an interview with CTV guzzling from a pitcher!!!! And downed some more during the interview. I would like to be at the party!!!!!!
It's a good thing he did not get wrecked on the course.....Those guys are NUTS!
yup ...it takes alot of nuts to be a human projectile ....funny he seems to think its a safe sport ...
That was priceless in the interview afterwards when he was auctioning off the pitcher of beer
